scripts.clean: node -e "console.log('ðŸ§¹ æ¸…ç†å‚™ä»½æ–‡ä»¶...'); const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const files = fs.readdirSync('.'); files.filter(f => f.startsWith('data_backup_')).forEach(f => { fs.unlinkSync(f); console.log('ðŸ—‘ï¸ å·²åˆªé™¤:', f); }); console.log('âœ… æ¸…ç†å®Œæˆ');"
scripts.backup: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const src = 'data_backup.json'; if(fs.existsSync(src)) { const dest = 'manual_backup_' + new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-') + '.json'; fs.copyFileSync(src, dest); console.log('ðŸ’¾ æ‰‹å‹•å‚™ä»½å·²å‰µå»º:', dest); } else { console.log('âŒ æ‰¾ä¸åˆ°å‚™ä»½æ–‡ä»¶'); }"
